titles.title: High Mage
titles.description: A powerful magic user who has mastered a wide range of spells and disciplines.

titles.title: Royal Knight
titles.description: A member of an elite guard sworn to protect the sovereign and their realm.

titles.title: Archdruid
titles.description: A revered leader of druidic communities, possessing deep connection to nature and its magic.

titles.title: Shadow Master
titles.description: An individual skilled in the art of stealth, assassination, and manipulation from the darkness.

titles.title: Herald of the Apocalypse
titles.description: A harbinger of doom, often associated with cataclysmic events or the rise of an evil power.
